sentences.sentence: He said, "I have visited many of the magnificent cathedrals in Europe."
sentences.translation: 他说：“我曾经参观过欧洲许多宏伟的大教堂。”

sentences.sentence: Castles, palaces and cathedrals have a longer lifespan than the dwellings of ordinary people.
sentences.translation: 城堡、宫殿和大教堂的寿命比普通人的住所寿命要长。

sentences.sentence: Pyramids, cathedrals, and rockets exist not because of geometry or thermodynamics, but because they were first a picture in the minds of those who built them.
sentences.translation: 金字塔、大教堂和火箭的存在并不是因为几何形状或热力学，而是因为它们首先是建造它们的人的脑海中的图画。
